creator: Ryan.Lubke@Sun.COM
text:
TLVs are a translation-time mechanism that should be treated exactly as
a syntax error.  That, according to JSP 2.4.1. leads to an HTTP 500
status.

Instead of returning a 500, Jasper returns a 200.

creator: kin-man.chung@sun.com
text: Fixed, both in the head branch and 4.0 branch.

creator: markt@apache.org
text: Closing to remove from list of open bugs.
